title: Neeko's Scent
body: {{champion:518}} Have you guys ever wondered what Neeko smells like? Do chameleons usually have a specific scent in the first place? Someone Mentioned it in a match I was playing and it really made me think. Sorry if this comes off as weird. I was just truly curious and wanted the input of the community. Thanks for your time.

replies.body: Honestly I can see her smelling pretty foul, she just be lookin all nast u kno. Like showers are unbeknownst to the likes of her

I mean she might've had access to the occasional waterfall. I mean I believe lizards would bathe themselves. However you may have a point there, as her backstory would make you believe she's a tad more whimsical.
Prob bathes in her own sweat, therefore causing continuous degradation to her aroma
The way extremely [dry dirt smells like when it hasn't rained in a while.](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Geosmin)
Ah I see, a scientific approach to this question. Now that's the quality content I like to see.
She smells delicious oh yeah uh
I thought this was a Warwick related question.
